content: Net Change in unrealized loss on investments for the third quarter was $3.2 million, consisting of $4 million of net unrealized losses on our warrant and equity portfolio, resulting from fair value and mark to market adjustments, as well as $5 million of net unrealized losses from foreign currency adjustments, offset favorably by $6 million of net unrealized gains on our debt investment portfolio, of which $13 million was unrealized gains related to the reversal of the previous loss on Pencil and Pixel, that Sajal mentioned.
